name: Support Butterflies
description: The other day I went outside and there was a butterfly that was the same color that I was wearing. I didn't know there were purple butterflies.  I remember watching a show about how some butterflies migrate across continents by using really high air currents and that's part of what I drew here.  A neighboring family grew butterflies from a caterpillar kit last year during quarantine and then released them once they were ready and in solidarity, I've planted a pollinator garden
